args.natural_language_statement:
Translate: Suppose z0 ∈ ℂ. Show that lim_{z→z0} f(z) = ∞ in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every M > 0 there exists δ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z-z0| < δ.

I'll express the Riemann-sphere notion by the equivalent condition that ‖f(z)‖ → +∞, i.e. Tendsto (fun z => ‖f z‖) (nhds z0) atTop. End the Lean statement with := by sorry.

args.natural_language_statement: Translate to Lean4 code: Prove equivalence: lim_{z→z0} f(z) = ∞ in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every M > 0 there exists δ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z-z0| < δ. Use the formulation "Tendsto (fun z => Complex.abs (f z)) (nhds z0) atTop" for the Riemann-sphere notion. End the Lean4 statement with := by sorry. Include `import Mathlib` at the top.

args.content:
import Mathlib

lemma tendsto_complex_abs_atTop_iff {f : ℂ → ℂ} {z0 : ℂ} :
  Tendsto (fun z => Complex.abs (f z)) (nhds z0) atTop ↔
  ∀ M : ℝ, 0 < M → ∃ δ : ℝ, 0 < δ ∧ ∀ z : ℂ, Complex.abs (z - z0) < δ → Complex.abs (f z) > M := by sorry

import Mathlib

lemma tendsto_norm_atTop_iff {f : ℂ → ℂ} {z0 : ℂ} :
  Filter.Tendsto (fun z => ‖f z‖) (Filter.nhds z0) Filter.atTop ↔
  ∀ M : ℝ, 0 < M → ∃ δ : ℝ, 0 < δ ∧ ∀ z : ℂ, ‖z - z0‖ < δ → ‖f z‖ > M := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Filter
open TopologicalSpace

lemma tendsto_norm_atTop_iff {f : ℂ → ℂ} {z0 : ℂ} :
  Tendsto (fun z => ‖f z‖) (nhds z0) atTop ↔
  ∀ M : ℝ, 0 < M → ∃ δ : ℝ, 0 < δ ∧ ∀ z : ℂ, ‖z - z0‖ < δ → ‖f z‖ > M := by sorry
